front.title: Management Event MIB for PacketCable/IPCablecom MTAs

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it provides a common data and format definition for events and specifies by what means events are transmitted for PacketCable/IPCablecom compliant Multimedia Terminal Adapter devices. This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is compliant to the SNMP SMIv2 [5][6][7]. The set of objects are consistent with the SNMP framework and existing SNMP standards
